Title: The Bagel Tee
Body (HTML):
Getting bageled never looked this good.

Our signature tee for the 6-0 Club. Premium heavyweight cotton with a minimalist bagel logo that says everything without saying anything. For those who show up, get demolished, and come back with a smile.

  • 100% premium heavyweight cotton (6.5 oz)
  • Screen-printed logo, water-based ink
  • Pre-shrunk, true to size
  • Ribbed crew neck
  • Made for losing in style

Limited quantities. No restocks. Once they're gone, they're gone.

Fits: True to size. If you're between sizes, size up for a relaxed fit.
SEO Title: Premium heavyweight tee for the 6-0 Club. Limited Drop 001.

Title: The 6-0 Hoodie
Body (HTML):
Warmth for the eternally defeated.

Premium heavyweight hoodie for post-match recovery. Oversized fit, brutalist logo placement, maximum comfort for maximum losses. Wear this to the court and they'll know you're part of the club.

  • 450 GSM heavyweight French terry cotton
  • Oversized, boxy fit
  • Embroidered chest logo + back graphic
  • Double-lined hood with tonal drawstrings
  • Kangaroo pocket
  • Ribbed cuffs and hem

For those who embrace the bagel. Limited quantities, no restocks.

Fits: Oversized. Size down for regular fit, true to size for relaxed.
SEO Title: Premium heavyweight hoodie for the 6-0 Club. Drop 001.

Title: Bageled Cap
Body (HTML):
Top off your look. Bottom out your scoreline.

Six-panel unstructured cap with embroidered bagel logo. Perfect for blocking out the sun (and the scoreboard). Premium cotton twill, adjustable strap, certified losing aesthetics.

  • 100% premium cotton twill
  • Six-panel unstructured crown
  • Embroidered 3D logo
  • Adjustable metal buckle closure
  • Pre-curved brim
  • Tonal undervisor

One size fits all defeats.

Fits: Adjustable, one size fits most (21.5" - 24")

Title: Court Joggers
Body (HTML):
Lose in comfort. Recover in style.

Premium athletic joggers built for the warm-up, the game, and the post-match debrief where you figure out what went wrong (again). Tapered fit, zippered pockets, subtle branding.

  • 320 GSM cotton/poly blend (80/20)
  • Tapered athletic fit
  • Zippered side pockets
  • Elastic waistband with drawstring
  • Ribbed ankle cuffs
  • Embroidered logo on thigh
  • Pre-shrunk

Perfect for court or couch. Either way, you're losing.

Fits: True to size, tapered fit. Size up for relaxed.

Title: 6-0 Sticker Pack
Body (HTML):
Rep the score everywhere.

Three premium vinyl stickers featuring the iconic 6-0 scoreline and bagel graphics. Stick them on your racket bag, water bottle, laptop, or anywhere you need a reminder that showing up is what counts.

  • Pack of 3 die-cut vinyl stickers
  • Weather-resistant, UV-coated
  • Sizes: 3" circle, 2x4" rectangle, 3" bagel
  • Matte finish
  • Perfect for racket cases, laptops, water bottles

Lose the match. Win the aesthetic.
